name: Grey Phobia
description: Grey Phobia is a Hack and Slash, third person shooter game, which is based on post apocalyptic, sci-fi, comix scenario.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.2 Ghz Graphics: NVidia GeForce 9800 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated audio
